snippet: Keven Joseph Davis, who was brought in by the father of Venus and Serena Williams when they were girls to aid in the development of their careers, died Dec. 23 at 54.
abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column remembers Keven Davis, lawyer who assisted with developing the tennis careers of Serena and Venus Williams, in light of his death at age 54.
lead_paragraph: Keven Joseph Davis, who was brought in by the father of Venus and Serena Williams when they were girls to aid in the development of their careers, died Dec. 23 at 54.

headline.seo: Keven Davis Helped Venus and Serena Williams Reach Top
headline.main: A Lawyer Who Helped a Family Realize Its Vision
headline.print_headline: A Lawyer Who Helped A Family Realize Its Vision
